metadata.title: CVE-2023-32003 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: `fs.mkdtemp()` and `fs.mkdtempSync()` can be used to bypass the permissionmodel check using a path traversal attack. This flaw arises from a missingcheck in the fs.mkdtemp() API and the impact is a malicious actor couldcreate an arbitrary directory. This vulnerability affects all users usingthe experimental permission model in Node.js 20. Please note that at thetime this CVE was issued, the permission model is an experimental featureof Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
